accessArchivePage.description-detail: Navigates the app to open the Archive page by selecting the "More options" menu and then "Archive".

addNewExpense.description-detail: Adds a new expense entry with a fixed amount of 20 to the user\'s expense list.

changeTheme.description-detail: Changes the app\'s display theme to the light mode through the settings menu.

switchingAccount.description-detail: Switches the user to a different account by navigating to the next account view.
